predicate.note: Frames file for 'leak' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 43.4, other framed members include exude. Comparison with exude.

example.name: intransitived
example.text: At stake was an $80,000 settlement involving who should pay what share of cleanup costs at the site of a former gas station, where underground fuel tanks had leaked and contaminated the soil.

example.name: transitive
example.text: He is also accused of lying under oath and of *trace* leaking information obtained from a wiretap he supervised.
example.arg: information obtained from a wiretap he supervised
